rules.description: Index, Rev 11 Index I, pages 1, 2, and 3
Engineering-Drawing Part Number Management, Rev 7 Section 3C
Descriptions of Engineer-To-Order Parts, Rev 3 Section 4B
Revised the document format and changed the use of engineering part number to drawing part number and
2. Deleted sections 3.11 Structural Engineering, 10.22 SETUP FEA, 10.23 RUN FEA, 10.24 FEA REPORTS,
Added sections 3.11 Proposal Projects, 3.12 Sales Order Projects, 10.18 FEA REPORTS, 10.19 CHECK
Revised majority of section numbers to reflect additions and deletions.
Revised all tables and notations in Appendix A. (minor revisions)
Revised section 4.0 to incorporate description format tables.
Revised description formats in all tables and added notations to Tables 1,5, and 6.
Boungnaseng 68-R. Evans 82-S. Hinton IOI-HPM Santos 136-1. Zhang 148-C. Yu
